Pro-crypto regulatory clarity and institutional adoption
Macro liquidity fragility (TGA dynamics, Japan yield volatility)

Cryptocurrency exchange security vulnerabilities creating binary systemic risk
Geopolitical trade friction and semiconductor export controls
